LanguageData.SolarRoofProduction.label: scalable solar roofs
LanguageData.SolarRoofProduction.description: Advances in solar panels allows you to build solar controllers and solar roofs for scalable power solutions.
LanguageData.ThickStoneRoofProduction.label: thick stone roofs
LanguageData.ThickStoneRoofProduction.description: Allows you to build thick stone roofs which can block drop pods.
LanguageData.ThickStoneRoofRemoval.label: thick stone roof removal
LanguageData.ThickStoneRoofRemoval.description: Allows you to remove thick stone roofs.
LanguageData.TransparentRoofProduction.label: transparent roofs
LanguageData.TransparentRoofProduction.description: Allows you to build transparent roofs for indoor greenhouses.
